summary: At 2 Ela lost her ability of seeing and hearing because of a severe illness. And then she became a total disappointment of her family due to her untamed behaviors. But everything changed ... See full summary »
cast: Beren Saat|Ugur Yücel|Ayça Bingöl|Turgay Kantürk|Hazar Ergüçlü|Ozanay Alpkan|Can Kalav|Bülent Minci Köseglu|Erdal Küçükkömürcü|Aynur Mutlucan|Akif Tuna|Serdar Çakmak|Yasemin Çonka|Tülay Özkan
title: Benim Dünyam
